DPRK Delegation Leaves for Ukraine 
   Pyongyang, June 5 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Kim Yong Sam, minister of Railways, left here today to participate in the 36th ministerial meeting of the Organization of Railways Cooperation to be held in Ukraine.
